text:
Hello guys
Hope you're doing well!!!
Please let me know, how can I use the offset inside of the deal so that I can get my all deal records.

curl --location --request GET '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/deals/?limit=1000>' \
--header 'authorization: Bearer ertpas4fdgdfgfd0dfsffdssd081dctertret8erte' (edited)
so the url will look like: `<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/deals/?limit=1000&after=xxxx>`  but replace xxxx with the paging.next.after value from the last response

Thanks for the help, Carter! In the future, <@U04HEQ8FF6J>, please reserve this channel for any Ideas you'd like folks to consider from our Ideas Forum on the Community. Please see the channel description.

If I use this request <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/deals/?after=111912653&limit=1000>
Then I get this error once more.
